root.name: unbinary()

example.code: s1 = "00010000" s2 = "00001000" s3 = "00000100" print(unbinary(s1)) # Prints "16" print(unbinary(s2)) # Prints "8" print(unbinary(s3)) # Prints "4"

root.description: Converts a string representation of a binary number to its equivalent integer value. For example, unbinary("00001000") will return 8.
